publishers.name: Various Databases, hosted by Proquest
publishers.description:
ca. 20 databases on various subjects :
  • Academic Video Online‎
  • ARTbibliographies Modern (ABM)‎ (1974 - aktuell)
  • Bibliografía de la Literatura Española‎
  • British Periodicals‎ (1681 - 2005)
  • ERIC‎ (1966 - aktuell)
  • Humanities Index‎ (1962 - aktuell)
  • Index Islamicus‎ (1906 - aktuell)
  • International Bibliography of Art (IBA)‎
  • International Bibliography of the Social Sciences (IBSS)‎
  • Library & Information Science Abstracts (LISA)‎ (1969 - aktuell)
  • Linguistics and Language Behavior Abstracts (LLBA)‎ (1973 - aktuell)
  • MEDLINE®‎ (1946 - aktuell)
  • National Criminal Justice Reference Service (NCJRS) Abstracts Database‎ (1975 - aktuell)
  • Periodicals Archive Online‎
  • Periodicals Index Online‎
  • PILOTS: Published International Literature On Traumatic Stress‎ (1871 - aktuell
  • ProQuest Digitized Newspapers: The New York Times Recent
  • ProQuest Dissertations & Theses A&I‎
  • ProQuest Historical Newspapers: South China Morning Post (1903-2000)
  • ProQuest Historical Newspapers: The Guardian and the Observer (1791-2003)
  • ProQuest Historical Newspapers: The Jerusalem Post (1932-2008)
  • ProQuest Historical Newspapers: U.S. Major Dailies (Zeitraum 1849-2015)
  • Social Services Abstracts‎ (1979 - aktuell)
  • Sociological Abstracts‎ (1952 - aktuell)
